problem_section.lost_buildings: Smart building should benefit to everyone
description: Colleges, gyms, small hospitals, senior living facilities... 80% of the real estate public portfolio
dont have access to a decent global management solution.

management.title: No energy management
management.description: Full heating during winter, permanent air conditioning in summer. Constant energy waste.

data.title: No data
data.description: Impossible to understand what consumes, when and why. No visibility on performance.

support.title: No support
support.description: In the event of a breakdown, it's an emergency. No preventive diagnosis, only curative maintenance.
